{"settings":"{
    "[python]": {
        "editor.formatOnType": true
    },
    "terminal.integrated.gpuAcceleration": "off",
    "workbench.iconTheme": "catppuccin-frappe",
    "workbench.tree.renderIndentGuides": "none",
    "workbench.layoutControl.enabled": false,
    "editor.renderWhitespace": "none",
    "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
    "vscode_vibrancy.imports": [
        "/path/to/file"
    ],
    "vscode_vibrancy.refreshInterval": 5,
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "editor.fontSize": 20,
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "monokaiPro.fileIconsMonochrome": true,
    "files.autoSave": "onFocusChange",
    "liveServer.settings.donotShowInfoMsg": true,
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "prettier.tabWidth": 4,
    "code-runner.saveAllFilesBeforeRun": true,
    "editor.guides.bracketPairs": "active",
    "terminal.integrated.cursorStyle": "line",
    "liveServer.settings.donotVerifyTags": true,
    "editor.linkedEditing": true,
    "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "JetBrainsMono Nerd Font Mono",
    "react-native-tools.showUserTips": false,
    "autoimport.filesToScan": "**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx}",
    "javascript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
    "editor.lineHeight": 0,
    "[javascript]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.typescript-language-features"
    },
    "[javascriptreact]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.typescript-language-features"
    },
    "editor.cursorBlinking": "smooth",
    "smoothtype.autoReload": true,
    "editor.cursorSmoothCaretAnimation": "on",
    "security.workspace.trust.banner": "never",
    "window.restoreFullscreen": true,
    "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true,
    "workbench.editor.enablePreview": false,
    "editor.minimap.autohide": true,
    "editor.bracketPairColorization.independentColorPoolPerBracketType": true,
    "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true,
    "editor.overviewRulerBorder": false,
    "editor.renderLineHighlight": "none",
    "editor.smoothScrolling": true,
    "editor.matchBrackets": "never",
    "editor.lightbulb.enabled": "off",
    "editor.scrollbar.vertical": "hidden",
    "editor.scrollBeyondLastLine": true,
    "editor.hideCursorInOverviewRuler": true,
    "editor.scrollbar.horizontalScrollbarSize": 10,
    "security.workspace.trust.startupPrompt": "always",
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
    "[html]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.html-language-features"
    },
    "[css]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.css-language-features"
    },
    "git.confirmSync": false,
    "[scss]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
    },
    "polacode.transparentBackground": true,
    "polacode.target": "snippet",
    "bracket-pair-colorizer-2.depreciation-notice": false,
    "compile-hero.scss-output-directory": "./",
    "compile-hero.sass-output-directory": "./",
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "[typescript]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.typescript-language-features"
    },
    "[typescriptreact]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.typescript-language-features"
    },
    "liveServer.settings.CustomBrowser": "chrome",
    "compile-hero.typescript-output-toggle": false,
    "compile-hero.typescriptx-output-toggle": false,
    "editor.lineNumbers": "off",
    "[json]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features"
    },
    "code-runner.runInTerminal": true,
    "debug.console.fontFamily": "JetBrainsMono Nerd Font Mono",
    "[jsonc]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features"
    },
    "editor.fontLigatures": true,
    "editor.fontWeight": "bold",
    "editor.cursorWidth": 4,
    "editor.glyphMargin": false,
    "editor.quickSuggestionsDelay": 0,
    "codesnap.target": "window",
    "extensions.ignoreRecommendations": true,
    "cmake.additionalCompilerSearchDirs": [
        "C:/msys64/mingw32/bin",
        "C:/msys64/mingw64/bin",
        "C:/msys64/clang32/bin",
        "C:/msys64/clang64/bin",
        "C:/msys64/clangarm64/bin",
        "C:/msys64/ucrt64/bin"
    ],
    "debug.onTaskErrors": "showErrors",
    "glassit.alpha": 10,
    "glassit.step": 3,
    "glassit.force_sway": true,
    "glassit-linux.opacity": 60,
    "workbench.editorAssociations": {
        "*.exe": "default",
        "*.txt": "default",
        "*.sqlite": "default"
    },
    "window.density.editorTabHeight": "default",
    "editor.unicodeHighlight.nonBasicASCII": false,
    "editor.unicodeHighlight.invisibleCharacters": false,
    "editor.accessibilitySupport": "off",
    "editor.gotoLocation.multipleDeclarations": "goto",
    "window.commandCenter": true,
    "animations.Install-Method": "Apc Customize UI++",
    "update.mode": "manual",
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
    "vscode_vibrancy.opacity": -1,
    "compile-hero.sass-output-toggle": false,
    "apc.imports": [
        "file:///c:/Users/yoshee/.vscode/extensions/brandonkirbyson.vscode-animations-2.0.1/dist/updateHandler.js"
    ],
    "remotefs.remote": {
        "buyprofit": {
            "scheme": "ftp",
            "host": "bone020.timeweb.ru",
            "username": "cr80266",
            "rootPath": "./",
            "password": "Qwerty123321"
        }
    },
    "remote.SSH.remotePlatform": {
        "drivelxm.beget.tech": "linux",
        "garaevza.beget.tech": "linux"
    },
    "terminal.integrated.enableMultiLinePasteWarning": false,
    "vim.cursorStylePerMode.insert": "line",
    "vim.cursorStylePerMode.normal": "block",
    "vim.cursorStylePerMode.replace": "underline",
    "vim.cursorStylePerMode.visual": "line",
    "vim.handleKeys": {
        "<C-d>": true,
        "<C-s>": false,
        "<C-z>": false
    },
    "debug.showInStatusBar": "always",
    "window.menuBarVisibility": "toggle",
    "editor.suggest.showStatusBar": true,
    "prettier.jsxSingleQuote": true,
    "prettier.singleQuote": true,
    "prettier.singleAttributePerLine": true,
    "prettier.useTabs": true,
    "prettier.withNodeModules": true,
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Catppuccin Frapp√©",
    "window.dialogStyle": "custom",
    "window.titleBarStyle": "custom",
    "editor.fontFamily": "JetBrains Mono SemiBold",
    "settingsSync.ignoredSettings": [
        "editor.fontFamily"
    ],
    "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [

    ],
    "chat.editor.fontWeight": "semibold",
    "[php]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "DEVSENSE.phptools-vscode"
    },
    "[csharp]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-vsliveshare.vsliveshare"
    },
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 17,
    "explorer.fileNesting.patterns": {
        "*.ts": "${capture}.js",
        "*.js": "${capture}.js.map, ${capture}.min.js, ${capture}.d.ts",
        "*.jsx": "${capture}.js",
        "*.tsx": "${capture}.ts",
        "tsconfig.json": "tsconfig.*.json",
        "package.json": "package-lock.json, yarn.lock, pnpm-lock.yaml, bun.lockb",
        "*.sqlite": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
        "*.db": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
        "*.sqlite3": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
        "*.db3": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
        "*.sdb": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
        "*.s3db": "${capture}.${extname}-*"
    },
}"}
